pr_title: Fixed error when specifying general fields by correcting unwanted characters list

timeline.message: Fixed error when specifying general fields by correcting unwanted chars list

timeline.bodyText: Please use the unwanted chars from the preferences
timeline.author: Siedlerchr

replies.bodyText: I thought the problem was that the list of unwanted chars from the preferences did not correspond to the unwanted characters for this particular case. I.e. the characters in the log message below are not the same that are stored in preferences. For example, ';' character is fine in this case because it's used to separate fields, but it is on the list of unwanted characters in preferences
replies.author: alex-petrov-vt

replies.bodyText: Ah okay, thanks for clarifying this.
replies.author: Siedlerchr

replies.bodyText: Please also add a changelog entry (the checkstyle issue is not related)
replies.author: Siedlerchr

replies.bodyText: Okay, I'll do later on tonight
replies.author: alex-petrov-vt

timeline.message: Added explanatory comment to the changes
